F

FictitiousPlayer - Class in it.polimi.se2019.controller
This class is used to create an Arraylist that is going to contain: player's color, position, available ammo, list of usable cards and their SingleCardActions.
FictitiousPlayer(Controller, Player, CellInfo, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.controller.FictitiousPlayer
This method creates a fictitious player that has supposedly taken the choices contained in the parameter cell

finalFrenzy - Variable in class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.GameModel
 
finalScoring(Controller, ArrayList<Player>) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.GameStats
this method scores the killshot track at the end of the fame it will: - score all boards that still have damage tokens, as usual but without killshot - score the killshot track: players (ordered by number of tokens) will get 8, 6, 4, 2, 1 points - ties in the score on the killshot track break in favor of the player that has the earliest token(s)

flipPlayerBoard() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.PlayerBoard

frenzyActivator(Controller) - Static method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.TurnManager
This method activates the final frenzy mode for the whole game (it's centered around a the active player)
